Control.Title: Sunburst Chart
Control.Description: Visualize hierarchical data using concentric circles with interactive features.

Sample.Name: Selection
Sample.Title: Selection
Sample.Description: This sample depicts the selection feature in the chart. On mobile, tap the segment, and on desktop, click the segment to select or deselect them.

Sample.Name: Drilldown
Sample.Title: Drill down
Sample.Description: This sample demonstrates the drill-down feature in the chart. On mobile, double-tap a segment, and on desktop, double-click a segment to explore deeper levels of data.
